price: ߣߎ߯ߤߎ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߌ ߞߣߊ߫ ߡߐ߰ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߕߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߛߋ߲߬ߘߐ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߊ߲߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
